Reference

Functions - fetching

Functions to fetch data from APIs

laus_trend()

Fetch local area unemployment statistics (LAUS) data over time

multi_geo_acs()

Fetch an ACS table with multiple geography levels

multi_geo_decennial()

Fetch a decennial census table with multiple geography levels

qwi_industry()

Get employees counts and total payroll over time

Functions - analyzing and plotting

Functions to analyze or quickly plot data

acs_quick_map()

Quickly create a choropleth sketch

adj_inflation()

Add inflation-adjusted values to a data frame

batch_csv_dump()

Write a list of data frames to CSV and keep it movin'

geo_level_plot()

Quickly make a ggplot to view data by geographic level

label_acs()

Quickly add the labels of ACS variables

Datasets

Reference datasets and lookup tables

acs_vars

Variable labels from the ACS

basic_table_nums

Basic ACS table numbers

decennial_vars

Variable labels from the Decennial Census

ext_table_nums

Extended ACS table numbers

laus_codes

LAUS area codes

msa

Names and GEOIDs of regional MSAs

naics_codes

NAICS industry codes

regions

Regions of Connecticut

nhv_tracts nhv_bgrps bridgeport_tracts stamford_tracts hartford_tracts

City neighborhoods by tract or block group

zip2town

Zip to town lookup

Shapefiles

bridgeport_sf hartford_sf new_haven_sf stamford_sf

Neighborhood shapefiles of Connecticut cities

town_sf

Connecticut town shapefile

tract_sf

Connecticut tract shapefile
